title: BroadcastFrequencySpecification
description: The frequency in MHz and the modulation used for a particular BroadcastService.

broadcastSubChannel.description: The subchannel used for the broadcast.

broadcastSignalModulation.description: The modulation (e.g. FM, AM, etc) used by a particular broadcast service.

broadcastFrequencyValue.description: The frequency in MHz for a particular broadcast.
